question: Hardayal Prasad was appointed as the MD and CEO of ___________.
explanation: SBI Card, the country's second-largest credit card issuer appointed Hardayal Prasad as new Managing Director (MD) & Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the company. He has replaced Vijay Jasuja. Prior to this appointment, Prasad was with State Bank of India, holding multiple leadership positions in the bank. He had joined SBI as a probationary officer in 1983.
